column1: Uchi////I came here with my family for my birthday. Although my reservation was at 7:45
column2: we were seated a little later which is understandable since it's incredibly packed. The food was just as good as the raves. Some of the best sake toro and scallop I have had. The hot rock was also delicious. I definitely recommend the foie gras. I did not really like the famous kaarage chicken. House sake is recommended. Top it off with the fried milk dessert. My server was really nice
column4: and the food came out in a nice order. It's a must try.
